argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mstaval.r | |- R = ( mStRed ` T ) |
| 2 |  | mstaval.s | |- S = ( mStat ` T ) |
| 3 |  | msrfo.p | |- P = ( mPreSt ` T ) |
| 4 | 3, 1 | #P_msrf | |- R : P --> P |
| 5 |  | #P_ffn | |- ( R : P --> P -> R Fn P ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_ax-mp | |- R Fn P |
| 7 |  | #P_dffn4 | |- ( R Fn P <-> R : P -onto-> ran R ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_mpbi | |- R : P -onto-> ran R |
| 9 | 1, 2 | #P_mstaval | |- S = ran R |
| 10 |  | #P_foeq3 | |- ( S = ran R -> ( R : P -onto-> S <-> R : P -onto-> ran R ) ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( R : P -onto-> S <-> R : P -onto-> ran R ) |
| 12 | 8, 11 | #P_mpbir | |- R : P -onto-> S |
